parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the time-based schedule.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the time-based schedule. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: FlowName
parameters.description:
The name of the flow that is associated with the time-based schedule. The name must be unique within the region and cannot be modified after the time-based schedule is created. The name must meet the following conventions:

*   The name can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
*   The name must start with a letter or an underscore (\_).
*   The name is case-sensitive.
*   The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: The trigger message of the time-based schedule. It must be in the JSON format.

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: The request ID. If you specify this parameter, the system uses this value as the ID of the request. If you do not specify this parameter, the system generates a value at random.

parameters.name: ScheduleName
parameters.description:
The name of the time-based schedule. The name must meet the following conventions:

*   The name can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
*   The name must start with a letter or an underscore (\_).
*   The name is case-sensitive.
*   The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length.
